mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_GEN, USER_PHONE, USER_BIRTH, USER_ADDRESS, USER_EMAIL, USER_STAR, USER_GRANT, USER_ACCOUNT, USER_BANK, USER_DATE FROM USERT ORDER BY USER_DATE DESC
SELECT USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_GEN, USER_PHONE, USER_BIRTH, USER_ADDRESS, USER_EMAIL, USER_STAR, USER_GRANT, USER_ACCOUNT, USER_BANK, USER_DATE FROM USERT WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERT ( USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_GEN, USER_PHONE, USER_BIRTH, USER_ADDRESS, USER_EMAIL ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userGen}, #{userPhone}, #{userBirth}, #{userAddress}, #{userEmail} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USERT SET USER_PW = #{userPw}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}, USER_BIRTH = #{userBirth}, USER_ADDRESS = #{userAddress}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
